overview: Léo Walk is 26 years old. After starting to break at the age of 7, he danced for Christine and the Queen and signed the choreographies of artists like Angèle. This year was supposed to be the year of consecration: Léo and his company La Marche Bleue were finally on the front of the stage. But that was before... Before the Covid.
title: Léo Walk : STOP !
